summary: Yellowish original fur to a more darker one. More brightness to the metal parts.
descriptionHtml:
Yellowish original fur to a more darker one. Overall darker fur and leather, more brightness to the metal parts.

See the picture. Enjoy!

Unpack to your skyrim folder. 

data\\textures\\armor\\hide\\m\\bootsheavy.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\hide\\m\\cuirassheavy.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\hide\\m\\gauntletsheavy.dds
data\\textures\\armor\\hide\\m\\helmetheavy.dds
